description.en:
TurnCoin is a digital security that derives its value from 100% of the global gross revenue generated by TheXchange.

TurnCoin is made available through compliant Securities Offerings that generate the capital to; develop, promote and manage TheXchange and VirtualStaX worldwide.

TurnCoin generates returns from every VirtualStaX that are sold, traded and promoted on the TheXchange and through the StaX App.

TurnCoin is a regulated, compliant, digital investment, accessible in over 100 countries and is transparent by design.
